name: (2022AU-1-6) Operation W.I.S.E
description:
AGENT- 

Your Mission should you choose to accept, is to collect all the data scattered across the city before it falls into enemy hands. The enemy is ordered to kill on site, failure of this mission will result in a mass loss of life.  use any means necessary to ensure the mission is complete.... even if it means using bombs. 

[REDACTED] 

CONTROLS

W- Forward

A- Left

S- Right 

D-Backward

Space- Jump

Left Click - Bombs 

The game is a self-contained Unity executable, so if your platform is offered as an option, save it wherever you like (or download it through the Itch.io app) and simply run it.

FOR MAC: The app is unsigned; the only reliable way to get it to run on modern Mac machines is to install and launch it through the itch.io app. https://itch.io/app. (You can also try following Apple's documentation on running unidentified apps, but success is not guaranteed (https://support.apple.com/guide/mac-help/open-a-mac-app-from-an-unidentified-dev...) (https://support.apple.com/en-us/HT202491))
